key_features: Give your body the total toning and strengthening workout
ai_description: A grey cast iron kettlebell with a spherical body and a black handle, featuring a durable neoprene coating. The brand name 'KAKSS' and weight '6 KG' are printed in white on the front. The product is shown against clean white backgrounds, with promotional images highlighting its features through circular insets showing material close-ups, ergonomic handle design, and cleaning ease. Some images include a matching grey workout mat with the same branding.
